mapper.insert: insert into test_board (title, content, writer, uno) values(#{title},#{content}, #{writer}, #{uno})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, uno from test_board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update test_board set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE test_board SET viewcnt = viewcnt+1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from test_board where bno > 0
